author: Andreas
content:
Thanks all. Yes, it was quite a contrast for me as well ðŸ™‚

As to the snow, well, those lines are traces made by wind and they are everywhere. They give you a lot to work with. It's always a compromise between going as much off the tracks to have no footsteps in the image, and staying as much on proven ground to not sink down into a snowdrift ðŸ™‚
